title: Top Strategies for Shifting Corporate Culture in 2021
itunes:title: Top Strategies for Shifting Corporate Culture in 2021
description:
Columbia University lecturer, award-winning author, speaker, advisor and DEI Strategist Kai Wright shares top strategies for shifting corporate culture in 2021. His research focuses on creating more inclusive workplaces. Wright is the author of "Follow the Feeling: Brand Building in a Noisy World."

Host: Paul Sweeney. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
